hero.description: Get instant answers about Moroccan law: Moudawana (Family Law), Penal Code, Labor Law, Real Estate, and Business setup.
hero.descriptionEn: Available in Arabic, French, English, and Darija.

chat.userQuestion: What is the penalty for theft in Morocco?
chat.aiResponse: According to the Moroccan Penal Code (Articles 505-534), simple theft is punishable by imprisonment from 1 to 5 years. If there is breaking or violence, the penalty can reach 10-20 years...

features.sectionDescription: Specialized AI legal assistant covering: Contracts, Inheritance, Divorce, Property Law, and Commercial disputes.
features.expertDesc: Trained on Official Bulletins, Court of Cassation rulings, and Moroccan Royal Dahirs.

howItWorks.step1Desc: Type your legal question in any language you prefer.
